game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR218 + 761
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: If you need some diesel power for your Regional Express services, look no further! This pack recreates Regional Express services on the Frankfurt – Karlsruhe route, and features the classic BR218 diesel loco, double-decker coaches and DBbzf driving trailer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: If you need some diesel power for your Regional Express services, look no further! This pack recreates Regional Express services on the Frankfurt – Karlsruhe route, and features the classic BR218 diesel loco, double-decker coaches and DBbzf driving trailer.
